body.name: MOUTHWATCHERS Dr Plotkas Extra Soft Flossing Toothbrush Manual Soft Toothbrush for Adults, Ultra CleanToothbrush, Good for Sensitive Teeth and Gums, 2 Pack - Colors May Vary
features: SOFT BRISTLE TOOTHBRUSH Dr Plotka’s toothbrush is quite simply the BEST.BRUSH.EVER TM! The extra soft, multi-layered bristles break up plaque and sweep away food and residue that other brushes miss - leaving your teeth looking bright and feeling noticeably cleaner, every time you brush. Pair with Dr Plotka’s 100% naturally-sourced Whitening Toothpaste for the ultimate brushing experience! Pack of 2 different color toothbrushes - colors will vary between Green, Blue, Red, and Orange.

SILVER TOOTHBRUSH Each polyester bristle is infused with silver, which naturally eliminates the buildup and debris that linger on most toothbrushes. Within 6 hours of using your brush, it’s fresh and clean, and ready for your next use. Happy brushing!

FLOSSING TOOTHBRUSH The tip of each flossing bristle is one micron, the thickness of a single human hair. These long, soft, floss-like bristles are 10X thinner than other bristles and reach between teeth, under the gum line, and deep into the grooves where most cavities form – better than any other toothbrush you will find!

SENSITIVE TEETH AND GUMS Soft polyester bristles are super gentle, perfect for sensitive teeth and gums. Polyester bristles are also longer lasting than traditional nylon bristles, so you can hold on to your brush for up to 4 months – 1 month longer than the typical toothbrush.

MOUTHWATCHERS was founded over 15 years ago by Dr. Ronald Plotka, DDS, a nationally renowned dentist with over 40 years of dentistry leadership. Dr. Plotka is dedicated to making life healthier with unique dental hygiene products that combine superior quality with the very latest technology – and guaranteed results!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best toothbrush I ever had . Not too soft, not too hard . Does great job. Good for tongue cleaning. This is only toothbrush I will buy. Easy on the gums.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Omg I love this!!
reviews.reviewText: These bristles are so full and SO soft and my teeth really do feel cleaner with this tooth brush, highly recommend. I floss anyway, but there is still a difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These toothbrushes are perfect if you tend to brush too hard. They are gentle on gums while leaving teeth feeling clean. Love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Effective between the teeth
reviews.reviewText: Its an OK tooth brush and it seems to clean well between my teeth. I still floss but its a good product- does'nt replace flossing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toothbrush I have ver used.
reviews.reviewText: I have been a Braun electric toothbrush user for years and only recently switched to a combination of this manual toothbrush and my trusty electric. We're supposed to brush twice daily so I use one in the morning and the other before retiring.The design of the bristles are unlike any other manual toothbrush I have used. They clean really well between teeth and are softer than most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical, but this really does a great job. My teeth and gums look and feel cleaner than with my old normal toothbrush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than an electric toothbrush…
reviews.reviewText: As long as I can buy these, I will. I never invested much in regular toothbrushes… Picked them up at the dollar store. Switched to an electric toothbrush tried it for a while for gum care. Will never use another toothbrush as long as these are available. Teeth are practically as clean as when I leave the dentist office and the bristles feel so good you want to brush longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good toothbrush, but for flossing?
reviews.reviewText: This toothbrush is attractive, great grip and very full brush-head. It arrived well-packaged, and performs excellently as a brushing device. As a flosser, in my use and opinion, not so much.First, because the brush head is so full, and my teeth nicely spaced (not huge gaps between 'em), it is hard, if not impossible, to separate a couple of bristles from the bruh, in order to use as flossing agent. Of course, one must separate the brittles because there is no way to use the entire brush head as a flossing tool--Unless your teeth are each spaced about 1/4" to 1/2 " apart.In Im which case, it'll work great, but condolences. Next, the bristles while beautifully soft - and thus a really good brushing tool -- are relatively short. Again, hard to floss w/ a short bristle.Hence my highish rating on the brush itself; lowish rating on the flossing part.As a consumer , I do question the ad on Amazon. What might corporate ethics say about the flossing promises in the ad ? Might the wording be over-stating matters? This I leave to manufacture's wisdom.
This toothbrush is amazing. Leaves a clean feeling after brushing.Too bad that it's not available locally here in Singapore but delivery was quick.Overall satisfied with it!
